entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
